name: Love Casino: Smoking Aces
description:
Visit the Love Casino - only one gaming house of its kind. Here you will be able to feel the passion in all its senses! For our players, it is not necessary to be rich as the only thing you can lose here is...your clothes. Forget about shyness and timidity, welcome to the world of excitement and forbidden desires!

Play Blackjack and let the cards open the way to the most intimate secrets of your opponents. There'll be two of them: a man and a woman. You can run the game according to your wish and strip one of them. Don't worry, our gamblers are rather intelligent about any preference.

Here is a short memo for a newcomer:
  • Start the game with two opponents;
  • Play classic Blackjack;
  • Try to get 21 points but not more;
  • Strip one of your opponents;
  • Try to keep as many clothes on yourself as possible!

Join our extremely fervent games of chance. We hope that you'll become our regular visitor!
